text: Minister for Highways and Minor Ports Edappadi K. Palaniswami along with officials inspected the construction works of the new corporation building on Saturday. The ground floor and the first floor of the central office that spread across 24,942 square feet is being constructed at a cost of Rs. 7 crore, while tenders have been floated for the construction of second and third floors at a cost of Rs. 5.13 crore. The Minister along with Mayor S. Soundappan, MP V. Paneerselvam, MLAs M.K. Selvaraj, G. Venkatachalam, Corporation Commissioner K.R. Selvaraj, Deputy Mayor M. Natesan, Executive Engineers A. Ashokan, R. Ravi and other officials inspected the work.
title: Minister inspects construction works
